abstract: A new proposal by Carl C. Icahn and Southeastern Asset Management presents some new complications for Dell’s special board committee. But in some ways, it simplifies matters a bit.
snippet: A new proposal by Carl C. Icahn and Southeastern Asset Management presents some new complications for Dell’s special board committee. But in some ways, it simplifies matters a bit.
lead_paragraph: The new proposal by Carl C. Icahn and Southeastern Asset Management for Dell presents some new complications that a special committee of the computer company’s board must consider.

headline.main: What Lies Ahead for Dell After Icahn’s New Demand

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
